scripts.build:local: rm -rf ./build && echo REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=$(whoami) > .env && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf ./build && echo REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=develop > .env && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
scripts.build:stage: rm -rf ./build && echo REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=stage > .env && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf ./build && echo REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=api > .env && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
